song.englishname: P.S. We'll Call You When We Get There

english.segment1: looking back alot has changed we never thought there'd come a day when everything we used to live for everything we did. and everything we say could fade away now we're left holding onto dreams small town kids we're gonna get there now it's. time i see those city lights i think it's tim to go and we'll come back home when we hit the big time and we'll come back. someday.
